name: Chocolate Pudding
description: Indulge in pure chocolate bliss with our quickest dessert that will win everyone over, not just the kids! What’s even better? It has less sugar than some store-bought varieties, simple & wholesome ingredients, and it’s customizable. Make it dairy-free by using your choice of plant-based milk.
preparation:
1. In a bowl or using an electric mixer on low, beat pudding mix with milk for 2 min.
  2. Cover and let chill for 10 min before serving. Serve with fresh berries, if desired.
tips:
Try with your choice of non-dairy milk. Top with fruit, layer in parfaits, or use in frozen desserts.

Mexican Chocolate Pudding: Add 1⁄2 tsp Cinnamon and a pinch of Chipotle Chili before mixing.

Mocha Pudding: Replace 1 cup milk with 1 cup chilled coffee.
